targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    sum(read_size_b) as "RX Total",
    sum(write_size_b) as "TX Total"
FROM $DB.metrics_task

WHERE
    $timeFilterByColumn(created_at)
    $conditionalTest(AND host = '$host', $host)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    sum(read_size_b) as "RX Total",
    sum(write_size_b) as "TX Total"
FROM crusty.metrics_task

WHERE
    created_at >= toDateTime(1624482277) AND created_at <= toDateTime(1624482579)
     AND host = 'crawler-1'

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 'total' as p, count(created_at) as "OK"

FROM $DB.metrics_task

WHERE
    $timeFilterByColumn(created_at) $conditionalTest( AND host = '$host', $host)
    AND error=0  AND term = 0
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT 'total' as p, count(created_at) as "OK"

FROM crusty.metrics_task

WHERE
    created_at >= toDateTime(1624481674) AND created_at <= toDateTime(1624481976)  AND host = 'crawler-1' 
    AND error=0  AND term = 0

FROM $DB.metrics_task

FROM crusty.metrics_task

WHERE
    created_at >= toDateTime(1624481674) AND created_at <= toDateTime(1624481976)  AND host = 'crawler-1' 
    AND error = 1

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 'total' as p, count(created_at) as "Term by error"

FROM $DB.metrics_task

WHERE
    $timeFilterByColumn(created_at) $conditionalTest( AND host = '$host', $host)
    AND term=1 AND term_reason  = '' AND term_kind = 'Error'
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT 'total' as p, count(created_at) as "Term by error"

FROM crusty.metrics_task

WHERE
    created_at >= toDateTime(1624488458) AND created_at <= toDateTime(1624488760)  AND host = 'crawler-1' 
    AND term=1 AND term_reason  = '' AND term_kind = 'Error'

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    max(toUnixTimestamp(created_at) * 1000) as time,
    sum(parse_time_micro) / sum(if(follow_ok = 1, read_size_b, 0)) / greatest($interval, 3) * 1024 * 1024 as "Parsing time"
FROM $DB.metrics_task

WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(created_at) $conditionalTest( AND host = '$host', $host)

GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), greatest($interval, 3))

ORDER BY time
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    max(toUnixTimestamp(created_at) * 1000) as time,
    sum(parse_time_micro) / sum(if(follow_ok = 1, read_size_b, 0)) / greatest(1, 3) * 1024 * 1024 as "Parsing time"
FROM crusty.metrics_task

WHERE created_at >= toDateTime(1624484008) AND created_at <= toDateTime(1624484310)  AND host = 'crawler-1' 

GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), greatest(1, 3))

ORDER BY time

panels.title: Parsing time / 1mb of raw HTML Data

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    toUnixTimestamp(max(created_at))*1000 as time,
    sum(items) / greatest($interval, 3) as Enqueued
FROM $DB.metrics_db

WHERE
    $timeFilterByColumn(created_at)
    $conditionalTest(AND host = '$host', $host)
    AND table_name = 'domains' AND label = 'insert'
    
GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), greatest($interval, 3))

ORDER BY time
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    toUnixTimestamp(max(created_at))*1000 as time,
    sum(items) / greatest(1, 3) as Enqueued
FROM crusty.metrics_db

WHERE
    created_at >= toDateTime(1624473090) AND created_at <= toDateTime(1624473392)
     AND host = 'crawler-1' 
    AND table_name = 'domains' AND label = 'insert'
    
GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), greatest(1, 3))

ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

ORDER BY time

targets.query:
SELECT
    max(toUnixTimestamp(created_at)*1000) as time,
    sum(read_size_b) / greatest($interval, 3) as RX,
    sum(write_size_b) / greatest($interval, 3) as TX
FROM $DB.metrics_task

WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(created_at) $conditionalTest(AND host = '$host', $host)
GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), greatest($interval, 3))

ORDER BY time
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    max(toUnixTimestamp(created_at)*1000) as time,
    sum(read_size_b) / greatest(1, 3) as RX,
    sum(write_size_b) / greatest(1, 3) as TX
FROM crusty.metrics_task

WHERE created_at >= toDateTime(1624483876) AND created_at <= toDateTime(1624484178)  AND host = 'crawler-1' 
GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), greatest(1, 3))

ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    max(toUnixTimestamp(created_at) * 1000) as time,
    count(follow_ok) / greatest($interval, 3) as Ok,
    sum(term) / greatest($interval, 3) as Term,
    sum(error) / greatest($interval, 3) as Error
FROM $DB.metrics_task

WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(created_at) $conditionalTest( AND host = '$host', $host)

GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), greatest($interval, 3))

ORDER BY time
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    max(toUnixTimestamp(created_at) * 1000) as time,
    count(follow_ok) / greatest(1, 3) as Ok,
    sum(term) / greatest(1, 3) as Term,
    sum(error) / greatest(1, 3) as Error
FROM crusty.metrics_task

WHERE created_at >= toDateTime(1624483833) AND created_at <= toDateTime(1624484135)  AND host = 'crawler-1' 

GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), greatest(1, 3))

ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    toUnixTimestamp(max(updated_at))*1000 as time,
    name,
    sum(len) / greatest($interval, 3) as "value"
FROM $DB.metrics_queue

WHERE
    $timeFilterByColumn(updated_at)
    $conditionalTest(AND host = '$host', $host)
    
GROUP BY name, intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(updated_at), greatest($interval, 3))
    
ORDER BY name, time
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    toUnixTimestamp(max(updated_at))*1000 as time,
    name,
    sum(len) / greatest(1, 3) as "value"
FROM crusty.metrics_queue

WHERE
    updated_at >= toDateTime(1624525512) AND updated_at <= toDateTime(1624525814)
     AND host = 'crawler-1' 
    
GROUP BY name, intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(updated_at), greatest(1, 3))
    
ORDER BY name, time
